channel.title: CVE Feed for Artifex Software Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artifex Software Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-8728|2024-08-06T02:27:41.291Z -- artifex%20software%20inc. -- mupdf
item.description: An exploitable heap out of bounds write vulnerability exists in the Fitz graphical library part of the MuPDF renderer. A specially crafted PDF file can cause a out of bounds write resulting in heap metadata and sensitive process memory corruption leading to potential code execution. Victim needs to open the specially crafted file in a vulnerable reader in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2016-8729|2024-08-06T02:27:41.252Z -- artifex%20software%20inc. -- mupdf
item.description: An exploitable memory corruption vulnerability exists in the JBIG2 parser of Artifex MuPDF 1.9. A specially crafted PDF can cause a negative number to be passed to a memset resulting in memory corruption and potential code execution. An attacker can specially craft a PDF and send to the victim to trigger this vulnerability.
